mapper.insert: insert into base_user ( user_name, password, name, birthday, address, mobile_phone, tel_phone, email, sex, type, status, description, crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host ) values( #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{mobilePhone}, #{telPhone}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{type}, #{status}, #{description}, now(), #{crtUser}, #{crtName}, #{crtHost} )
mapper.update: update base_user set user_name = #{bo.userName}, password = #{bo.password}, name = #{bo.name}, birthday = #{bo.birthday}, address = #{bo.address}, mobile_phone = #{bo.mobilePhone}, tel_phone = #{bo.telPhone}, email = #{bo.email}, sex = #{bo.sex}, type = #{bo.type}, status = #{bo.status}, description = #{bo.description}, upd_time = now(), upd_user = #{bo.updUser}, upd_name = #{bo.updName}, upd_host = #{bo.updHost} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, password, name, birthday, address, mobile_phone, tel_phone, email, sex, type, status, description, crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_name, upd_host from base_user where id = #{id}
